trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_Q1_000_005<tab>How are things?
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_Q1_000_010<tab>What is this equipment you have?
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_Q1_000_015<tab>Is this equipment for me?
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_Q1_000_020<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_100<tab>Ever since ye showed me that crystal, me hunger for craftin' has been damn near insatiable.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_101<tab>In fact, I've been spendin' so much time in here, I think I might be breathin' me own breath... I s'pose that's the danger o' livin' an' workin' in a forge beneath the sea.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_102<tab>Maybe I should think about buildin' meself a little house someplace. All this constant hammerin' <var 1A 02 /var>has<var 1A 01 /var> brought in a fair share o' coin, after all.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_110<tab>Ever since ye came traipsin' through here, I've been reminded o' how bleedin' lonely it can get down here. Even sent a letter to the Crystarium.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_111<tab>I trained there in me youth, if ye can believe it. Made the damn near finest kettles Norvrandt had ever seen. <sigh> Good times, they were... Would that I could live 'em again.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_112<tab>Hmmm. Maybe I can. Not as a student, but a teacher. Aye, I could build a workshop, take a few younglings under me wing. Somethin' to think about, eh?

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_120<tab>Well, I've been travelin' back an' forth between me workbench here an' the Crystarium. Seems when it comes to me regular work, I prefer to hammer away in a place what's set up just how I like it.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_121<tab>But I tell ye, there's no beatin' the world above for fresh ideas. That little project with Miss Chora-Zoi is as much for me benefit as it is for hers─I can already feel the seeds of inspiration takin' root.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_122<tab>An' the more time I spend in the Crystarium, the more chance there is o' Mistress Mowen payin' me a visit... Uh, I mean “us”! The workshop in town, that is! Purely for professional reasons!

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_130<tab>Workin' so far away from me dear Mowen tugs at the ol' heart strings, aye, but life goes on. I reckon that's why I prefer the Crystarium over me underwater hovel these days─can't expect any visits from me beloved when I'm surrounded by sea slugs.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_131<tab>But ye heard the vows. Ours is a marriage born out o' love an' a mutual respect for our life's work. We'll keep on improvin', no matter the distance between us. Each time I gaze at me kettle, I know Mowen's thinkin' the very same.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_132<tab>Come to think of it, Miss Chora-Zoi once said she walked the smitty's path because o' me kettles. The fates have made it a symbol of hope for us all, it seems... Perhaps one day they'll inspire the whole bleedin' realm, just like our splendorous tools.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_300<tab>That shell of a crystal ye carry about... It tells a hero's tale. A tragic saga o' hope an' loss.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_301<tab>In me attempt to capture that achin' majesty in armor, I've poured me all into cloth, an' leather, an' metal─a “journey's end” for the memories what remain. An' if I'm ever struck by that same lightning, I reckon I can do it again.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_SYSTEM_000_302<tab>Complete level 80 role quests to unlock Journey's End gear rewards for each respective role.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_400<tab>These works were inspired by the tragic tale of a hero, an' only a true champion can wield the legacy what's found at that journey's end.

TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_GRENOLDT_000_401<tab>But if I reckon ye've got the spirit an' the stones for it, I'll be happy to craft 'em for ye for free. Aye, I don't reckon I'll be able to stop meself...
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>Journey's End gear rewards can be collected for jobs in which you have attained level 80.
TEXT_REGNOR4GRENOLDT_00628_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>In the event that you lose this gear, you may speak with Grenoldt again to collect a replacement.
